description: Compressed primes: a(n) is the nearest integer to prime(n)/log prime(n).
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
M. Stein and S. M. Ulam, An observation on the distribution of primes, Amer. Math. Monthly 74 (1967), 43-44.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) n=0; forprime (p=1, 9999, a=round(p/log(p)); write("b002036.txt", n++, " ", a); if (n>=1000, break)) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 16 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 15 2002
